text: Tirol-Choco () is a type of chocolate made in Japan. It has been made since 2004. Tyrol is an area of Austria. When Tirol-Choco's president visited Austria, he decided to use the name to give his brand a fresh image. Tirol- Choco is cheap. It costs about 10 yen (10 cents) to 30 yen (30 cents). == References == Category:Chocolate Category:Japanese food
title: Tirol-Choco
